title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 119 - New York Fiduciary Adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 119 - New York Fiduciary Adjustment

State Regulations
§ 119.1 - New York fiduciary adjustment and its allocation
§ 119.2 - Allocating fiduciary adjustment among estate or trust and its beneficiaries
§ 119.3 - Alternate method of attributing modifications among estate, trust and its beneficiaries
§ 119.4 to 119.5 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 119

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
